Hi All;
 
 First, the thing, the equiment I make, and experiment with as a=

e) was never described by me, it's inverntor, as the "Telephone to the Dead=
", that label was put on my equipment, loaned to Moon for testing, he was t=
he first to want to test the box, he is not, and was not designated by me a=
s the "primary tester".  In fact he has yet to pay anything for the boxes h=
e has, or any of the other equipment he "barrowed", such as the Sony pocket=
 size cassette recorder, and Tarot CD, he still has. Moon is the one that c=
laims only he, or a designated trainee can properly interpret the output of=
 the box, despite the fact that I have stated numerous times that I made th=
e box for anyone to use, and one's results are any no better or supercede i=
n anyway the results of anyone else. 
 
 Now when someone claims that these=
 new system don't work, or only get the evil spirits, and even open portals=
 so demons, or what not can enter, they are lying, and attempting to keep t=
he use of any equipment,  and methods of spirit communication for themselve=
s. The motive being priofit,a s far as I can tell. The portal thing is Holl=
ywood! I use my equimpemt in my basement,. and have sinece 2000, amnd have =
never expereinced anything I could call evil beside soem cussing, nakme cal=
ling voices, which is hardly threatening except to maybe 13 year old girl. =

 
 I must point put, because of preivisou threats, that slander is stating=
 something in public about a person that is knowingly untrue. So for anyone=
 comptemplating such threats I can say only-- Bring It, I will have everyth=
ing you own!
